title: i get an error after pressing launch
body: i tried to log into league and it says league.exe - bad image i don't know what to do but if i'm unable to log back into league i will have put over hundreds onto that account.... please help me because i would really like to continue playing this game i tried running it as administrator and i deleted discord

replies.body:
This is likely caused by security settings that are blocking games files from being accessed or installing properly.  Run through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to help make sure access is being allowed.  

You'll then want to download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and perform a repatch or reinstall to fix up any potentiall bad files.
thank you so so so much sir all i needed was the hextech repair tool downloaded and it ran like i horse!!!! {{sticker:sg-lux}} {{sticker:sg-lux}} {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
I've got this too, I just posted my own discussion about this, no idea what's going on
do you use discord? and do you use the discord overlay? This overlay is at the moment buggy and doesn't allow you to launch the game.
just curios did the error message look like this https://gyazo.com/37ef83a31003fd4e26d9325e62b25063 because i had this issue and nobody is helping me with it. Thanks
